events.text: This is on me… I’m the one who has to end it.
No turning back. I started this—I'll see it through.
The world’s falling apart because we let it. Time to fix that.
Everything leads here… to the Devourer. This is it.
Just one more step... it’s either me, or the dump wins.
I’m not coming back unless I shut this down.
A trash heap... and the whole world’s scared of it. Let’s show it why it should’ve feared me instead.
